name: Batoto Deep Subway
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
A style made for the "Subway" theme on Batoto. Hides ads, and removes unnecessary stuff when reading a manga. And it's pleasant to look at even in the evening or night.

user.name: Nihagi
user.about:
Yo, I'm just your average 28 year old who finds some fun in making styles now and then.

If you happen to like any of the styles I made, feel free to voice it.

If you got a site you want me to style for you, I might not be the right person to ask.
I'm extremely lazy and only do whatever I feel for in the moment.
But if that wont hold you back, feel free to ask me the favor.

Cheers~

additional_info:
This is a style I made with my other style (Batoto Soothing Dark) in mind. But for the Subway theme instead. The buttons in the top have been reduced in size due to several people requesting it on the forum. If you find anything you wish were changed or simply something that is bugging you. Or should you want to share any positive words, feel free to post it here ^.^ Hope you'll enjoy all your manga while using this style. Update List:
Nov 26th 2014
* Fixed some stuff with pageless chapters
Sep 18th 2014
* Styled the lightbox (image popouts from posts/comments) And fixed it so you can Right-click and save image.
* Fixed the tag editor while making a new topic or the likes.
* Fixed style on polls.
